correct_order: Our Applied Computer Science major is all about giving you the skills to solve computerrelated problems.
With rapid advances in technology and new applications being developed constantly,it is hard to say what those problems will be.
One thing is for sure, though, it is going to be exciting finding out.

sources: With rapid advances in technology and new applications being developed constantly,it is hard to say what those problems will be.
Our Applied Computer Science major is all about giving you the skills to solve computerrelated problems.
One thing is for sure, though, it is going to be exciting finding out.
